etymologies: late 17th century: from medieval Latin dispensarium, neuter (used as a noun) of dispensarius, from Latin dispensare (see dispense)

definitions: a room where medicines are prepared and provided.
shortDefinitions: room where medicines are prepared and provided

definitions: a clinic provided by public or charitable funds.
shortDefinitions: clinic provided by public or charitable funds

definitions: a facility that prepares and sells medical marijuana

examples.text: state-issued ID cards are good for up to two ounces of pot a month from state-approved dispensaries

shortDefinitions: facility that sells cannabis as recommended by doctor
